HOWIE'S HOME INSPECTIONS

A Professional Home Inspection Company Serving Ogden, UT And The Surrounding Areas.

DEDICATED TO EXCELLENT SERVICE

As a professional home inspection company in the Ogden, UT area, Howie's Home Inspections is dedicated to providing the highest quality inspection services available.

Buying a home is a major investment and we take pride in helping clients with one of the most important decisions they’ll ever make. A thorough home inspection will help keep you safe and protect you from costly repairs.

As one of Ogden, UT areas most trusted inspection companies, we inspect every home as if we were buying it for ourselves. All of our inspectors are licensed and insured with a track record of honesty and integrity. Easy-to-read reports are delivered within 24 hours and will provide you with the knowledge you need to make an informed purchasing decision.

SERVICES WE OFFER

Residential Inspection

A residential home inspection will uncover hidden problems that can be costly or pose a safety hazard to your family. We will perform a complete and thorough home inspection and check all major areas of your home.

Mold Inspection

Mold can cause health problems and homeowners often don’t even know mold is present until they experience symptoms. We use visual inspection as well as lab sampling to determine if there is mold present in the home.

Radon Inspection

Radon is recognized by the U.S. Surgeon General as a major safety hazard and it’s the second leading cause of lung cancer in the United States. We’ll use specialized equipment to detect radon levels and alert you to any high readings that may pose a safety hazard.
